literally the worst game i've ever played. and the players on this game... oh my god. i could snort line after line of gfuel and still not be able to come up with something more stupid than these people. 

and on top of that, they're so god damn sanctimonious. and they get upset over anything you say to them. one of those disgusting #positivevibes lot. they're fine with being toxic to you ingame, but if you dare to say even the slightest thing against them, they'll start acting like a sub in a smackdown ring.

i would recommend staying away from this game. even the devs will hate you. you'll think they like you, but once you start to gain experience and lose the status of new player, you'll realise you're no longer their target player. they'll also never listen to you. but they'll acknowledge you for saying nice things. no criticism allowed though.

also there aren't enough female characters with bare feet visible. massive no no for the game.

Support/Meldungen werden gar nicht berücksichtigt. Die Spielidee ist an sich echt super, aber die Killer sind mit der Zeit den Überlebenden deutlich überlegen..... Mit Fähigkeiten und Zusätzen sind diese teils völlig overpowered, Macht irgendwann einfach keinen Spaß mehr zumal viel zu viele scheiss Camper und Tunnler unterwegs sind. Sucht euch n anderes Spiel. Da hier rein gar nichts gegen gemeldete Spieler passiert, verliert sich somit auch automatisch eine gute Bewertung

Game is fun but the killers are beyond OP. New players don't have a chance to compete. Also, LONG waiting times. Honestly, very annoying knowing that you're helpless against killers. At least in Friday the 13th you can fight back. This game is easy for killers and hard for survivors. Even with all the bs, it's pretty fun when playing with others. They really need to nerf the killers though, absolutely bs that they run so fast.

After having spent almost 3 years on this I can with certainty say do not buy this piece of crap game. The devs don't care at all. Everyone makes excuses for them but honestly it's them virtue signaling for them. This is the only game BHVR is currently supporting so there's no reason they can't fix it. But as always everything is okay with in game bloodpoints giveaways when they fuck up and overpriced cosmetics. At one point this game was fun and the devs at least cared somewhat, now it's a damn joke of a game riddled with bugs and hackers. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!

This game is spectacular. I am someone with under 100 hours at the time of my review right now, so my opinion is not super valid, but not many of my friends play a variety of games so I started my first 30-32 hours solo and got to know the ropes of the game and what kinda works and what doesn't. It is a $20 game when it's full price which is like 3/4 of the time but it often goes on sale for a mere $8 and $8 is like how much you spend on snacks at the store when you're bored, and hours of excitement is greater than an hour of taste bud joy. I'm getting off track, but all in all this game is fun to play casually and competitively, whichever suits you on that day. Grinding is so rewarding when you are just leveling up and getting so many perks unlocked - no game is perfect and this is far from it but it gets pretty damn close for what it is.

I'm gonna be honest with you on this one, if you like gore, uncomfortable sound effects, and generally hunting down people because you're a sick freak like me...Then sure, play it I guess.

In all seriousness, here are some pros and cons:

[PROS]
-A decent amount of character customization
-Generally balanced gameplay
-Well built environments (including available living spaces!)
-Fun to play with firends

[CONS]
-Some addons/perks make the ruin the gameplay by ending a player's experience too quickly or annoying
-(Though it is to be expected in a horror game) Some visuals (such as the hooking of the players) and audio effects (The heartbeat sound effect) can make players with anxiety uncomfortable
-Though not an actual gameplay issue, I personally have come across many disappointing performances from other players (most commonly trolling the killer or the killer camping the survivors), though to be fair I have come across a few good players in my history with the game
-A few graphical bugs including lighting of levels and character model clipping

Even with the cons outnumbering the pros I would still recommend this game because it's extremely fun to play with friends.

l

Con más de 1,200 horas jugadas al día de hoy sigo pensando que Dead by Daylight no es un juego perfecto, pero sin duda alguna muy divertido, a veces.
Depende de tu suerte realmente, de sobreviviente podrás encontrar partidas buenísimas donde necesitarás de habilidad para escapar y burlar al asesino, abriéndote paso entre los generadores requeridos para escapar y demás y otros días simplemente encontraras partidas donde el asesino te amargara la experiencia ya que hay algunas mecánicas o perks los cuales hacen el juego no injugable sino menos disfrutable.
Hablando de ambos lados, la cosa esta bastante pareja, para survs y killers, perks buenos y malos para cada uno y una constante atención de los desarrolladores agregando contenido y "arreglando" errores y """"""balanceando"""""" perks y otras cosas del juego.
En resumen, es muy buen juego con amigos, quizá jugando solo te aburras pero con amigos siempre tendrás un muy buen rato de diversion.

I hate having to write a negative review, because I love this game, but the people and things surrounding it just make it worse and bad. Toxic players making playing killer a nightmare, while on the other hand survivor just feels a bit broken with some perks, ds, dead hard, and crutch perks just make the game bad and ruins games most of the time.
I would recommend you to pick the game up, but in the state of the game I can't even tell you to feel happy about anything in it.
